page.title: 10Young Offenders in Salterton
page.content: We interviewed a police constable and he told us that there was quite a lot of drinking in Budleigh Salterton but not many young people were picked up for drunkeness.There is a lot of vandalism,such as destroying public benches and fences and paint spraying. Many old people complain to the police about young people playing their music and annoying old people in their houses. Many young people are involved in stealing.The policeman thought that there should be more youth groups in the town as many youngsters have no hobbies and just spend their time at night hanging around the streets.A child can be arrested for a suspected offence when they are ten years old.
